teaching.topicContent: Introduce the concept of phonology as the sound system of language. Discuss how spoken language is composed of individual sounds.Engage students in activities that highlight different sounds in words.
Explain blending as combining sounds to form words. Practice blending simple consonant-vowel words.  Use letter cards to model blending and have students try it.
Embrace the quirky 'qu' sound as in 'quirky.' Explore words with 'qu' like 'queen,' 'quick,' and 'quiet.'
Hop around with the 'ng' sound as in 'hop.' Practice blending words like 'sing,' 'long,' and 'song.
March along with the 'ar' sound as in 'march.' Engage with words containing 'ar' like 'car,' 'far,' and 'star.'
Lesson Content: Blend together the 'ff' blend as in 'blend.' Explore words with 'ff' like 'off,' 'stuff,' and 'cliff.
Catch the sneaky 'ss' sound as in 'sneaky.' Practice blending words like 'miss,' 'grass,' and 'hiss.'
Crack the code of the 'cr' blend as in 'crack.' Engage with words starting with 'cr' like 'crab,' 'crane,' and 'crop.'
Whirl around with the 'wh' sound as in 'whirl.' Explore words containing 'wh' like 'wheel,' 'whale,' and 'white.'
Feel the sizzle of words with 'sp' and 'st' final blends, such as 'stop,' 'spin,' 'rest,' and 'fast.' Engage in interactive activities to reinforce these blends.
Introduction to the magic 'E' that changes vowel sounds, as in 'cake' and 'time.' Explore words like 'bake,' 'like,' 'hope,' and 'rule.'
Dive into words with the 'ee' sound and patterns, including 'ee,' 'y,' and 'ea.' Explore words like 'tree,' 'happy,' 'beach,' and 'sea.'

teaching.topicTitle: Adventure with the 'ai' Sound and Patterns
teaching.topicContent: Embark on an adventure with the 'ai' sound and patterns, including 'ai,' 'ay,' and Magic 'E' with 'a.' Discover words like 'rain,' 'day,' 'said,' and 'wait.'

teaching.topicTitle: Journey with the 'ie' Sound and Patterns
teaching.topicContent: Take a journey with the 'ie' sound and patterns, including 'ie,' 'y,' 'igh,' and Magic 'E' with 'i.' Explore words like 'pie,' 'sky,' 'high,' and 'kite.'
Set off on a journey with the 'oa' sound and patterns, including 'oa,' 'ow,' and Magic 'E' with 'o.' Discover words like 'boat,' 'snow,' and 'home.'
Unveil the 'ue' sound and patterns, including 'ue,' 'ew,' and Magic 'E' with 'u.' Explore words like 'blue,' 'new,' and 'cute.'
Embark on a journey to discover the 'oi' and 'oy' sound, as in 'coin' and 'boy.' Explore words like 'join,' 'toy,' and 'royal.'
Discover words with the 'or' sound, like 'fork,' 'corn,' and 'born.' Practice reading and spelling these words.
Awaken the 'aw' sound in words like 'saw,' 'raw,' and 'draw.' Engage in activities that reinforce this sound.
Explore the 'ur' sound in words like 'fur,' 'hurt,' and 'turn.' Practice reading and identifying words with this sound.

test.description: Put your Phonics and letter sound knowledge to the test.
